channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Caravans, 2nd September
item.description:
Resident called again regarding two caravans that are being worked on in Somerset Avenue at the top end Jct with Sutherland Avenue. She complained that they are blocking access and their tools are been left on the footway. Passed to ATS. Please can the Technician call her back with an update.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Somerset Avenue, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Feeding of Rats and Pigeons, 2nd September
item.description:
This issue has been reported on two other occasions however the offender persists in feeding the rats and pigeons in Lodge road and the surrounding area. I have approached the building manager of the building where this lady resides to raise concerns on the issue and they have repeatedly asked her to stop. Despite this we are seeing an increase in issues on our grounds with pest control and significantly increasing the number of rats and pigeons in the area. We have experienced damage to our buildings and would like enforcement action to stop this. A number of locals businesses and residents will be emailing Environmental Control to try and force some response as this appears to be getting ignored

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15-17, Lodge Road, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Rubbish continuously left outside on mews, 2nd September
item.description:
